data.name: Zombie Army 4: Gas Mask Headgear Bundle
data.detailed_description:
Now that the legions of the undead have laid waste to Europe, fears of poisonous gasses are a thing of the past. However, the masks themselves have been repurposed as protective headgear – strong enough to withstand a bite or two!
This Bundle contains 4 Gas Masks, usable by all characters.
data.about_the_game:
Now that the legions of the undead have laid waste to Europe, fears of poisonous gasses are a thing of the past. However, the masks themselves have been repurposed as protective headgear – strong enough to withstand a bite or two!
This Bundle contains 4 Gas Masks, usable by all characters.
data.short_description: Now that the legions of the undead have laid waste to Europe, fears of poisonous gasses are a thing of the past. However, the masks themselves have been repurposed as protective headgear
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit / Windows 7 64-bit*
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1030 2GB (or AMD equivalent)
  • Additional Notes: *Windows 7 64-bit version 7601 supported only via the Vulkan launcher option.
